ad-units/citation.title: Citation
ad-units/citation.description: Academic-style citations that reference products like research sources - perfect for research tools and educational AI platforms that need professional, non-intrusive recommendations.

ad-units/ecommerce-cards.title: Ecommerce Cards
ad-units/ecommerce-cards.description: The AdMeshEcommerceCards component displays product recommendations in a horizontal scrolling grid format, similar to Google product search results. Perfect for ecommerce platforms and shopping interfaces.

ad-units/expandable-unit.title: Expandable Unit
ad-units/expandable-unit.description: The AdMeshExpandableUnit is a comprehensive ad format inspired by modern sponsored content layouts. It features a collapsible design with multiple content sections, making it perfect for detailed product showcases while maintaining a clean, unobtrusive appearance when collapsed.

ad-units/layout.title: Layout Patterns
ad-units/layout.description: Learn how to create comprehensive layouts using AdMeshProductCard components - perfect for showcasing multiple products and comprehensive recommendation displays.

ad-units/one-line-ad.title: One Line Ad
ad-units/one-line-ad.description: The most minimal and unobtrusive ad format - perfect for clean, natural product recommendations that blend seamlessly into content.

ad-units/overview.title: Overview
ad-units/overview.description: AdMesh offers multiple ad formats designed to integrate seamlessly with AI Platforms and conversational interfaces. Each format is optimized for different use cases and user experiences.

ad-units/product-card.title: Product Card
ad-units/product-card.description: Comprehensive product recommendation cards with detailed information, features, and pricing - perfect for showcasing products with rich visual and textual content.

api/authentication.title: Authentication
api/authentication.description: Simple API key authentication for AdMesh recommendations API.

api/recommendations.title: Recommendations API
api/recommendations.description: Get intelligent product recommendations with a simple API call.

examples/ai-assistant.title: AI Assistant Integration
examples/ai-assistant.description: Technical implementation guide for building AI assistants with intelligent product recommendation capabilities using AdMesh. This example demonstrates production-ready conversational AI with contextual product suggestions.

examples/integration-examples.title: Integration Examples
examples/integration-examples.description: Ready-to-use code examples for different languages and frameworks.

getting-started/api-keys.title: Getting Your API Key
getting-started/api-keys.description: Get your API key to start using AdMesh.

getting-started/quick-start.title: Quick Start Guide
getting-started/quick-start.description: Get AdMesh recommendations in 3 simple steps.

intro.title: AdMesh
intro.description: Professional AI agent integration platform for intelligent product recommendations

privacy-and-security/compliance-standard.title: Privacy & Security Compliance Standards
privacy-and-security/compliance-standard.description: AdMesh is designed with privacy-first principles and complies with major international privacy and security standards. Our PII sanitization functionality helps ensure your applications meet regulatory requirements.

privacy-and-security/pii-sanitization.title: PII Sanitization & Privacy Protection
privacy-and-security/pii-sanitization.description: AdMesh SDKs include built-in Personally Identifiable Information (PII) sanitization to ensure user privacy while maintaining recommendation quality. This feature automatically detects and removes sensitive information before sending queries to our API.

ui-sdk/customization.title: Advanced Customization
ui-sdk/customization.description: The AdMesh UI SDK provides extensive customization options to give AI platforms complete freedom over the appearance and behavior of ad components.

ui-sdk/installation.title: UI SDK Installation
ui-sdk/installation.description: The AdMesh UI SDK is a production-ready React + TypeScript component library for displaying product recommendations with integrated tracking, theming, and conversational interface support.

ui-sdk/layout-component.title: AdMeshLayout Component
ui-sdk/layout-component.description: The AdMeshLayout component is the unified, intelligent layout system for displaying AdMesh recommendations. It automatically detects the best layout based on your data and provides consistent, FTC-compliant displays across all platforms.

ui-sdk/legal-compliance.title: Legal Compliance & Disclosure System
ui-sdk/legal-compliance.description: The AdMesh UI SDK includes a comprehensive disclosure system designed to ensure full compliance with FTC, EU, and ASCI guidelines while maintaining user trust and engagement.
